title: North Loop Clinic & Pharmacy
description: North Loop Clinic & Pharmacy offers a wide range of services to meet your primary, specialty and wellness needs.
cleaned_text: North Loop Clinic & Pharmacy The North Loop Clinic & Pharmacy is situated in the historic TractorWorks building, offering many services and convenient hours. [ North Loop Clinic & Pharmacy ](https://www.hennepinhealthcare.org/clinic/north-loop-clinic-and-pharmacy/) [800 Washington Avenue N, Suite 190Minneapolis, MN 55401](http://maps.apple.com/?address=%20800%20Washington%20Avenue%20N,%20Suite%20190,%20Minneapolis,%20MN%2055401) 8:00 am - 5:00 pm, M-F Appointments: [612-873-6963](tel:612-873-6963) North Loop Pharmacy Pharmacy hours: 8:30 am -5:00 pm M-F Closed 1:00-1:30 pm for lunch Closed weekends Pharmacy / Refills: [612-352-5710](tel:612-352-5710) (or use [MyChart](https://mychart.hcmc.org/MyChart/Authentication/Login?)) This pharmacy is open to all residents, not just clinic patients. The pharmacy carries SkinCeuticals skin care products and other retail items, and offers free mail delivery.
